docs.lead_paragraph: As my colleagues Campbell Robertson and Liz Robbins report, "Federal and state officials criticized BP on Friday for what they said was an inadequate response to the growing oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico." The Lede will track news of the oil slick's spread on Friday. Video of the deadly fire on the oil rig that exploded last week is in a previous post on the disaster.

headline.main: Updates on the Oil Slick in the Gulf of Mexico

docs.abstract: Updates on the oil slick spreading in the Gulf of Mexico following last week's explosion at an offshore oil rig.
docs.snippet: Updates on the oil slick spreading in the Gulf of Mexico following last week's explosion at an offshore oil rig.

docs.lead_paragraph: Chilled fingertips and toes are a minor nuisance for most people with Raynaud’s disease, but for some it can be a sign of a more serious illness.

headline.main: When Cold Fingers Mean Raynaud’s, or Worse
headline.print_headline: When Cold Fingers Mean Raynaud’s, or Worse

docs.snippet: Chilled fingertips and toes are a minor nuisance for most people with Raynaud’s disease, but for some it can be a sign of a more serious illness.
